function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of new control measures and technology","Impact":"Changes to ventilation, lighting, and other systems may impact disease propagation if not properly managed.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of control measures, along with proper training for building occupants.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation units, automatic detection, lighting control systems.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance personnel, facility managers.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Increase in energy efficiency and HVAC control","Impact":"Changes in heating, cooling, and ventilation systems may affect air circulation and indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC systems, air quality monitoring, and proper ventilation design.","Technologies":"High-efficiency HVAC systems, air quality sensors, demand-controlled ventilation.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance personnel, facility managers.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Improvements in overall comfort and building performance","Impact":"Enhancements to building systems may affect occupant comfort and well-being if not properly regulated.","Mitigation":"Occupant feedback collection, regular comfort assessments, and proper adjustment of building systems based on occupancy.","Technologies":"Occupant feedback systems, building automation systems, comfort monitoring sensors.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, maintenance personnel"}]}
